Sentencas: The kinetics of the steam reforming reaction of CH(4) were investigated at temperatures 750 to 950 degrees C under both open-circuit and closed-circuit conditions on Ni-YSZ (Yttria Stabilized Zirconia) solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anodes and polycrystalline Ni film SOFC anodes of measured Ni surface area.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: It was found that the rate of methane reforming on the Ni surface exhibits a Langmuir-Hinshelwood type dependence on P(CH4) and P(H2O) which results from competitive adsorption of carbonaceous species and oxygen or OH.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: Consequently the rate is maximized for intermediate P(CH4) to P(H2O)
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes
Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: The reaction kinetics are affected significantly by cell current and potential under closed-circuit conditions.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: Over a rather wide range of operating conditions the observed rate changes are Faradaic, which implies negligible variation in the catalytic properties of the Ni surface with potential.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: At lower temperatures, however, and particularly under conditions of carbon deposition, the rates of CO, H(2), CO(2) and, more importantly, carbon formation exhibit pronounced non-Faradaic (NEMCA), or electrochemical promotion, behaviour.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes

Sentencas: Some non-Faradaic behaviour is also observed for higher H(2)O to CH(4) ratios but in this ease the effect of applied potential is reproducible but not readily reversible.
Titulo: Catalysis, Electrocatalysis and Electrochemical Promotion of the Steam Reforming of Methane over Ni Film and Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes
